nodes.text: Alduq Besene was a male Human who lived in Mos Eisley on Tatooine during the Galactic Civil War. He worked as an artisan for Jabba the Hutt and was always looking for new talent. Circa 1 ABY, he paid a spacer to create a number of tools, to test the spacer's ability.

Alduq Besene was a non-player character in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
